This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Calling element.animate() with a replace -> replace animation should create an animation. 
PASS Calling element.animate() with an add -> add animation should throw a NotSupportedError. 
PASS Calling element.animate() with a replace -> add animation should throw a NotSupportedError. 
PASS Calling element.animate() with an add -> replace animation should throw a NotSupportedError. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
